name: Snapdragon Salon
description: Known for their expertise in Balayage and hair painting, they offer customized color services in a friendly and professional environment. They are also a Bellami Hair Extension Flagship salon

name: Bravo Salon
address: 7171 E Mayo Blvd Suite 105, Scottsdale, AZ 85260
description: Offers Balayage highlights using a French painting technique for a natural, effortless look. They emphasize low damage and high gloss finishes

name: Hair by Nassi
address: 8300 N Hayden Rd Suite G104, Scottsdale, AZ 85258 (also has a Mesa location)
description: Specializes in Balayage highlights and dimensional hair color, with Nassi Morgan being a master hair colorist and extension specialist since 1993

name: La Roc Salon (Inside Sachi Salon Suites)
address: 3240 E Camelback Rd, Ste #4, Phoenix, AZ 85018
description: Offers a range of hair coloring services, including Balayage, with highly positive reviews for their expertise

name: Taglio Salon
address: 7137 E Stetson Dr Suite 105, Scottsdale, AZ 85251
description: A luxury salon offering a wide array of hair and beauty services, including advanced color techniques

name: Mane Attraction Salon
description: A premier luxury hair salon in Phoenix since 1977, known for high-end styling and personalized consultations

name: Rochelle's Salon & Spa
description: Offers a variety of services including haircuts, color treatments, and more, with a reputation for skilled staff and an inviting atmosphere

name: Hair n Dipity Salon and Spa
description: Provides a wide range of services including hair coloring, styling, and Balayage, with praise for their friendly staff and skilled stylists

name: Timeless Artistry
address: 209 E Baseline Rd E203-3, Tempe, AZ 85283
description: Highly rated for Balayage and other color services, offering a personalized approach to hair transformations

name: Outlaw Beauty Bar
address: 6702 E Cave Creek Rd, Cave Creek, AZ 85331
description: Known for specialized Balayage services and a strong focus on client satisfaction
